text: Hagalee bolo go nia hagadilinga mee hua ala beenei. Au guu dugu hua nia mee huogodoo bolo nia balumee, di mee hua e dahi dela koia e dahidamee, ge hagalabagau, dela go di iloo a Jesus Christ, go dogu Dagi. Nia mee huogodoo guu kili ko au gi daha, idimaa, go Christ. Au guu dugu nia mee aanei bolo ma nia balumee, bolo gii mee au di kae a Christ,
